articles.title: OpenAI, Walmart team up for ChatGPT shopping
articles.author: Qatar Tribune
articles.summary: OpenAI is partnering with Walmart to allow shoppers to [undisclosed functionality].

articles.title: A Closer Look at SEO Advertising's Role in Sustainable Online Business Growth
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Rhino Web Studios emphasizes the importance of structuring digital presence for e-commerce success through SEO advertising. This approach blends organic visibility with paid search, ensuring relevance and driving long-term profitability for businesses. The integration of SEO and advertising allows e-commerce platforms to create self-improving campaigns, enhancing visibility and customer engagement.

articles.title: Samsung showcases its vision of ‘AI for All' at IMC 2025
articles.author: Daily Excelsior
org: Communications and Development of North Eastern Region
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled its vision of 'AI for All' at the India Mobile Congress (IMC) 2025, showcasing how artificial intelligence is being seamlessly integrated across its ecosystem of devices. The showcase included flagship Galaxy devices like the Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy Z Fold7, Galaxy Z Flip7, Galaxy Watch7 and Galaxy Buds3 Pro featuring powerful AI tools.

articles.title: Is Microsoft's first ever handheld Xbox console worth the wait?
articles.author: Tom Gerken
articles.summary: The ROG Xbox Ally, including the more powerful ROG Xbox Ally X, has been released worldwide. This handheld console natively supports Xbox's Game Pass and runs Windows, allowing users to play PC games. The ROG Xbox Ally costs £499, while the ROG Xbox Ally X costs £799.

articles.title: Top 9 AI Sexting Apps – Realistic Convos With NSFW AI (2025)
articles.author: David E. Maxwell
articles.summary: The article introduces and reviews several AI sexting applications, including Candy.ai, OurDream AI, Temptations.ai, GirlfriendGPT, SoulGen, DreamGF, Wife.app, FantasyGF.ai, and PornX.ai. These apps offer features such as customizable AI companions, explicit content, realistic conversations, and AI-generated images, catering to users seeking virtual intimate experiences, with different tiers of subscription plans.

articles.title: 38 Things That Reviewers Say They Would Absolutely Recommend
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Eos launched Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil, which is a new iteration of their TikTok-famous "cashmere" body lotion. The oil features the same scent of whipped vanilla, musk, and soft caramel and helps protect the skin from razor burn, offering an extra close shave.

articles.title: Slideshow: Aramark serves a slam dunk with menu innovations
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A company is launching multiple new offerings. This debut coincides with the start of the NBA and NHL seasons.

articles.title: World's first Robot Phone by Honor moves and emotes like 'Wall-E'
articles.author: Aamir Khollam
articles.summary: Honor unveiled the 'Robot Phone,' a concept device blending AI, robotics, and mobile design. This device features AI-powered multi-modal intelligence, robotic functionality, and advanced handheld imaging capabilities, including a gimbal-mounted camera. While currently a concept, Honor plans to reveal more details and potentially a prototype at Mobile World Congress next spring.

articles.title: Smucker sues Trader Joe's over crustless PB&J sandwich dupe
articles.author: Upworthy
articles.summary: Smucker has filed a lawsuit against Trader Joe's, alleging that Trader Joe's round, crustless PB&J sandwiches infringe on Smucker's Uncrustables trademark due to similar pie-like crimp markings on the edges. Smucker argues that Trader Joe's product violates its trademarks.

articles.title: Ooni Drives Technology Innovation, Youth Engagement With Ojaja AI Centre
articles.author: New Telegraph
articles.summary: Ooni of Ife launched the Ojaja Artificial Intelligence (AI) Centre in Lagos, featuring Ojaja Mall, Ojaja Cinemas, and a shopping mall that will be driven by AI. This center aims to empower youths, showcase technology, and promote locally made products, with a goal to expand to all 36 states within five years.

articles.title: Perfect Moment Unveils AW25 Collection: Heritage Reimagined, Innovation Defined
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Perfect Moment Ltd. has revealed its Autumn/Winter 2025 collection. The AW25 collection blends innovative design, performance-led fashion, and the spirit of global style, drawing on cultural touchpoints from four influential cities.

articles.title: Firefly Debuts Glow Wraps at DPAA Summit: An Electrifying Leap in Mobility Media
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Firefly introduced Glow Wraps, a new product for out-of-home (OOH) advertising, at the DPAA Global Summit in New York City. This physical activation represents a pioneering leap in OOH innovation for Firefly.

articles.title: 30 Boring Walmart Products You'll Be Glad You Have
articles.author: Griffin Gonzales
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of various new products for home and personal use. These products include a stud finder, clothing steamer, laundry cart, dryer balls, pet hair remover, magnetic notepads, a robot vacuum and mop, sofa armchair caddy, and a draft stopper, among others. The range of products covers home improvement, cleaning, organization, and personal comfort, each offering solutions to everyday problems.

articles.title: ServWorx Plumbing Introduces Advanced Hydrojetting Machine with Special Launch Offer
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: ServWorx Plumbing has introduced a new, high-efficiency hydrojetting machine to its service fleet, expanding the company's advanced drain cleaning capabilities for residential and commercial clients. To introduce the benefits of this technology, ServWorx Plumbing announced a special promotional offer of hydrojetting service for a flat rate of $650 for the first two hours.

articles.title: Lay's reveals new potato chip bag design in nearly 100-year history
articles.summary: Lay's is introducing a new potato chip bag design as part of its largest rebrand in nearly 100 years. The rebrand also includes changes to Lay's recipes.

articles.title: Flumberico Launches in New York, Simplifying Everyday Innovation
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Flumberico, a new company founded by Tim Flumberico, has launched with the mission to simplify innovation. The company focuses on developing practical solutions and plans to expand its offerings in 2026 to include software tools and lifestyle products.

articles.title: How to Operate as a Content Writer Using the Samsung VR View
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is launching 'Project Moohan', a mixed reality device built on Android XR in collaboration with Google and Qualcomm. The device aims to blend daily life with mixed reality capabilities. The launch event will showcase Samsung's advancements in multimodal AI and mixed reality.

articles.title: Anthropic is giving away its powerful Claude Haiku 4.5 AI for free to take on OpenAI
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Anthropic has launched Claude Haiku 4.5, a new, cheaper, and faster AI model, now available for free to all users of Claude.ai. This launch follows Anthropic's recent release of Claude Sonnet 4.5, and marks a move to democratize access to advanced AI capabilities.

articles.title: Samsung's Android XR headset arrives next week to challenge Vision Pro M5 – here's how to watch
articles.author: Chris Smith
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil its Galaxy XR headset (formerly Project Moohan) on October 21 during the 'Worlds Wide Open' event. The headset, powered by Android XR and Snapdragon XR2 Gen 2 chip, is expected to rival Apple's Vision Pro and Meta Quest 3, featuring 4K micro-OLED displays and focusing on integrating AI into immersive experiences. Samsung plans to release the device before the end of the year.

articles.title: Digital Twins... When Family Life Becomes Smarter
articles.author: Pasant Elzaitony
articles.summary: The 'Digital Twin' is a virtual replica of a home, utilizing sensor data and AI to optimize performance, manage energy, and suggest ways to save money.  It analyzes lifestyle patterns to help families organize time efficiently and coordinates smart home devices to automate tasks, aiming for a balanced and smarter home life.

articles.title: Utz Brands launches new snacks
articles.author: Stacy Wescoe
articles.summary: Utz Brands Inc. will introduce new flavor launches and product innovations at the 2025 National Association of Convenience Stores Show, including Cheddar Bacon Ranch Flavored Utz Cheese Balls, Sizzlin' Summer Burger Flavored Utz Ripples, Salt & Malt Vinegar and Jalapeño Flavored Utz Kettle Chips, Avocado Oil flavored Boulder Canyon chips, Bayou Blackened Ranch Flavored Zapp's Kettle Chips, Hot & Spicy Cheddar Flavored Golden Flake Pork Rinds, and Bacon Ranch Flavored TGI Fridays Potato Skins.

articles.title: I just reviewed the Xbox Ally, ask me anything
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: Microsoft is launching its first 'Xbox' handhelds, the Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X, built and co-developed by Asus. A reviewer from The Verge is hosting a subscriber-only AMA to answer questions about the new devices on Thursday, October 16th.

articles.title: AP Trending SummaryBrief at 2:16 p.m. EDT
articles.author: Ottumwa Courier
articles.summary: J.M. Smucker has filed a lawsuit against Trader Joe's, claiming that Trader Joe's new frozen peanut butter and jelly sandwiches are too similar in design and packaging to Smucker's Uncrustables. The lawsuit alleges that Trader Joe's sandwiches feature similar crimp markings and use the same blue color for their packaging as Smucker's Uncrustables.

articles.title: Legendz Casino no deposit bonus guide: Claim 500 Gold Coins + 3 Sweeps Coins free
articles.author: David Fernandez
articles.summary: Legendz Casino offers a welcome bonus for new players consisting of 500 Gold Coins and 3 Sweeps Coins upon signup.  Existing players can benefit from diverse promotions like a daily login bonus and referral bonuses.  Players can use Gold Coins to play for fun and Sweeps Coins to play in sweepstakes mode.

articles.title: Avant unveils Wonders Advent Calendar for 2025 – there's a huge £835 discount
articles.author: Brijiena Lovelace
articles.summary: Avant Skincare has launched the Wonders Advent Calendar 2025, priced at £99 but worth £935, offering a substantial discount. The 12-door calendar contains luxurious beauty products and features an augmented reality experience when scanned with a phone. Select calendars also contain golden tickets for a chance to win Avant Skincare products.

articles.title: How to get Nokko in Warframe
articles.author: Shacknews
articles.summary: Nokko launched "Nokko, the new Fungal Frame." The product is available in-game now.

articles.title: I saved £500 by buying a mattress on Temu – it was a risk but it's so comfy & even comes with a memory foam topper
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: A shopper purchased a mattress from Temu for £68. The mattress is waterproof backed and memory foam topped. The shopper and her daughter are pleased with the quality for the price.

articles.title: MGX Launches No-Code AI App Builder to Automate Custom Application Development
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: MGX (MetaGPT X) has launched its MGX no-code AI app builder, a platform designed to allow users to create production-ready applications using natural language without coding. The platform uses 'Iris' for market analysis and 'Race Mode' to ensure code reliability through competitive AI agent teams. The MGX no-code AI app builder is now available to the public.

articles.title: Anthropic launches new version of scaled-down 'Haiku' model
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Anthropic has launched Claude Haiku 4.5, a new version of its smallest AI model, which it claims offers similar performance to Sonnet 4 but at a lower cost and with increased speed. This new version will be the default for all free Anthropic plans and is designed for use in production environments, especially where multiple agents need to be deployed in parallel.

articles.title: How The ROG Xbox Ally X Embraces Complexity To Find The Future
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Asus and Microsoft are partnering to launch the ROG Xbox Ally X portable gaming console. This Windows 11-powered handheld aims to shape the future of gaming.

articles.title: For 70% off and practically a Dyson, this hair dryer is what to buy now
articles.author: Victoria McDonnell
articles.summary: Cosy Companions High-Speed Blow Dryer, dubbed a 'Dyson impostor', is offered to Amazon Prime members at a 70% discount. The dryer features a 130,000 RPM brushless motor, negative ion output, and advanced heat control. It aims to dry hair quickly with reduced static and heat damage.

articles.title: Ryan Reynolds Co-Stars With a Real Tilly Norwood in New Mint Mobile Ad
articles.author: The Hollywood Reporter
articles.summary: Mont Mobile launched Minternet, a new home internet offering, featured in a spot starring Reynolds and Norwood.

articles.title: Honor 預告 Robot Phone：AI 搭配 Osmo Pocket 式雲台相機
articles.summary: Honor has previewed its Robot Phone, an innovative concept featuring a gimbal camera similar to DJI Osmo Pocket, concealed in the phone's back. This AI-powered camera system offers features like auto-tracking and object recognition. Honor plans to reveal more details about the Robot Phone at MWC 2026.

articles.title: Blend Unveils Vision for Intelligent Origination: A New Operating Model for Lending
articles.summary: Blend Labs has launched Intelligent Origination, an AI-powered system integrated into its digital lending platform. This system aims to improve lending operations by embedding intelligence directly into the lending process. Starting in 2026, Blend will expand Intelligent Origination into additional use cases across various lending products.

articles.title: Blend Unveils Vision for Intelligent Origination: A New Operating Model for Lending
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Blend Labs, Inc. has announced Intelligent Origination, an AI-powered system. This system is built into Blend's digital lending platform. It is designed to redefine lending operations.

articles.title: Nashville SEO Agency NEWMEDIA.COM Launches AI-Powered Search Engine Optimization And Digital Marketing Services For Nashville Companies
articles.author: NEWMEDIA.COM Nashville
articles.summary: NEWMEDIA.COM, a full-service digital agency, offers SEO services in Nashville, focusing on verifiable outcomes and data-driven optimization. They provide full-site audits, competitive analysis, continuous optimization, and transparent reporting. The agency's track record spans various sectors including healthcare, real estate, and e-commerce.

articles.title: Water-resistant HONOR X7d now available in PHL
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: HONOR Philippines has launched the HONOR X7d smartphone, a new entry-level device in the X Series. The phone features IP65 water resistance, a 6,500mAh battery, a 108MP camera, and runs on MagicOS 9.0 based on Android 15 with AI features. Pre-orders are available until Oct. 24 with a promotional camping light speaker.

articles.title: Madison Reed's Agentic AI and Sticky Subscriptions Fuel IPO Buzz.'
articles.author: Sindhya Valloppillil
articles.summary: Madison Reed has launched an agentic AI concierge named Madi to boost bookings and product discovery, automating consultations and scheduling appointments. The company's hair-color subscription engine is also a key offering, driving recurring revenue and margin expansion. Madison Reed is expanding its product suite with new technology-driven products that integrate AI, personalization, and repair science.

articles.title: Top German arthouse distributor Neue Vision takes on streamers with its own platform
articles.author: Screen Daily
articles.summary: Neue Visionen launched its streaming service, Neue Visionen Plus (NVP), on October 15. The streaming service's first title is a French comedy by Emmanuel Courcol. Mascha Schilinski's German Oscar entry and Lea Todorov's social drama will follow.

articles.title: Positive Grid Spark LINK XLR Review: No Think—Just Link
articles.author: Nick Stockton
articles.summary: Positive Grid launched the Spark LINK XLR wireless audio system, designed for easy setup and use. The system features plug-and-play functionality, eliminating the need for complex configurations or app integrations, and is ideal for live performances or studio use. It offers a stable range of up to 70 feet and lasts about 7 hours per charge.

articles.title: Jio launches Rs 799 safety-first phone designed for every Indian
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Reliance Jio launched the JioBharat Safety-First phone, a safety-centric mobile phone designed to protect users from digital threats. Priced at Rs 799, the phone features real-time tracking, content filtering, and health monitoring, targeting children, women, and senior citizens. The phone is available across Jio Stores, leading mobile retail outlets, JioMart, Amazon, and Swiggy Instamart.

articles.title: 30 Essential Walmart Items Every Adult Needs
articles.author: Emily Shwake
articles.summary: The article showcases an array of products aimed at improving daily life, including a Pantene Pro-V Volume and Body Shampoo and a Milani Setting Spray. Additional highlights include a Power Bank by Belkin, a clothing steamer, and a gel nail kit, all intended to offer convenience and solutions for various needs and interests.

articles.title: We tested 32 canned mocktails from 7 brands – these 10 options made us forget they're nonalcoholic
articles.author: Zoe Malin
articles.summary: The article discusses various canned mocktail brands and their new product offerings. Free AF's Whiskey Ginger and margaritas, Naked Life's Mojito and Classic G&T, Recess's Paloma, Mingle Mocktail's mimosas, Lyre's Classico Sparkling, Figlia's Fiore Frizzante, and Ghia are highlighted for their unique flavors and ability to mimic alcoholic beverages, providing consumers with sophisticated, convenient, and 'better for you' booze-free alternatives.

articles.title: Kantar Nigeria reintroduces business and expanded solutions in Lagos
articles.author: Daniel Obi
articles.summary: Kantar Nigeria has unveiled its enhanced suite of business solutions and AI capabilities to clients in Lagos. The updated services include research, analytics, sustainability, consulting, and AI-powered insights.

articles.title: Meghan Markle ‘loves' this organic body wash and it's just $12
articles.author: Karen Silas
articles.summary: Dr. Bronner's offers multipurpose vegan and cruelty-free liquid soaps, available in eight scents including peppermint, lavender, and almond. The '18-in-1' soap can be used for personal care, home cleaning, and even pet washing due to its natural ingredients like organic coconut, olive, hemp seed, and jojoba oils.

articles.title: Washing machine for HUMANS rinses your whole body inside giant pod & even plays movies while you wait
articles.author: Jamie Harris
articles.summary: Science has revealed the 'Human Washer of the Future', a human washing machine that cleans users automatically using microscopic bubbles and sensors to detect physical and mental wellness. The device, which includes a projector for calming movies, is set to appear in hotels around Japan, with six units already ordered.

articles.title: ‘Ghost Of Yotei' Dev Mulls A Third Game Or ‘Sly Cooper' Revival
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Sucker Punch is evaluating a sequel to Ghost of Yotei. They are also considering reviving the Sly Cooper franchise after 20 years, potentially introducing a new installment or service related to the property.

articles.title: 5 Foldable Phones That Can Compete With Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7
articles.author: Sparsh Sharma
articles.summary: Foldable smartphones, including models competing with the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, are redefining premium mobile experiences. These phones feature advanced cameras, AMOLED displays, and flagship-level performance. They offer premium multitasking and entertainment experiences.

articles.title: ROG Xbox Ally X review
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: ROG Ally X, a new handheld gaming device, is being reviewed. It is being considered as a potential Steam Deck replacement. The device's nature is questioned as whether it is an Xbox or a PC.

articles.title: Even Experts Say This $10 Drugstore Cream Performs Like La Mer
articles.author: Michelle Rostamian
articles.summary: Nivea Creme, a $10 multi-purpose moisturizer, is presented as a cost-effective alternative to luxury creams like La Mer. Praised by dermatologists and skincare enthusiasts, the cream contains Eucerit and provides deep, lasting hydration for face and body, making it suitable for all skin types. Over 7,000 Amazon shoppers have purchased the product this month.

articles.title: Pioneering the Next Generation: Building an 800 VDC Ecosystem for Efficient and Scalable AI Factories
articles.author: Archyde
articles.summary: NVIDIA, along with partners like AOS, Infineon, onsemi, Bizlink, Delta, Flex, ABB, Eaton, and Schneider Electric, are collaborating to accelerate the adoption of 800 VDC power distribution and integrated multi-timescale energy storage in data centers. This new two-pronged strategy addresses the challenges of increasing AI power consumption and workload volatility, offering enhanced efficiency and grid stability. The move to 800 VDC aligns with advancements in electric vehicle technology.

articles.title: Honor's Robot Phone concept features a fold-out camera arm
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Honor has announced a concept device called the 'Robot Phone,' featuring an AI-enabled, gimbal-mounted camera. The phone is part of Honor's 'Alpha Plan' corporate vision and may be showcased at Mobile World Congress next spring. The Robot Phone was announced at the end of a launch event for Honor's Magic 8 flagship phones.

articles.title: New Agency Platform Website Goes Live, Delivering Smarter Solutions for Agencies
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Agency Platform launched a redesigned website on October 15, 2025, featuring faster navigation, enhanced tools, and improved performance. This upgrade aims to empower agencies with resourceful digital solutions for streamlined processes, optimized workflows, and seamless scalability. The new website offers a sleek design, enhanced performance, and improved tools for managing digital marketing operations.

articles.title: HONOR Launches AI-Flagship HONOR Magic8 Series in China
articles.author: Honor Device Co.
articles.summary: HONOR launched the HONOR Magic8 Series in China, positioned as HONOR's first Self-Evolving AI Smartphone. The series features the advanced generation of HONOR's YOYO Agent, breakthrough AI camera capabilities, and industry-leading performance. The HONOR Magic8 Pro is the leading model, integrating AI innovations.

articles.title: All We Know About Tyra Bank's New Hot Ice Cream
articles.author: Lauren Jarvis-Gibson
articles.summary: Tyra Banks' ice cream brand, SMiZE & DREAM, has launched a new product: hot ice cream. This innovative dessert is a sippable, warm version of traditional ice cream, served in a 3D cup. The first flavor, TYRA'S FAVORITE, is described as a liquid version of a favorite ice cream scoop.

articles.title: KAYAK INTRODUCES AI MODE: CONVERSATIONAL TRAVEL SEARCH, JUST IN TIME FOR HOLIDAY PLANNING
articles.author: KAYAK
articles.summary: KAYAK launched AI Mode, a natural-language search experience powered by ChatGPT, directly on its homepage. This new feature allows users to plan entire trips by typing questions into the search box, making KAYAK the first major travel site to offer this capability.

articles.title: Gable: Interview With Co-Founder & CEO Chad Sanderson About The Data Change Management Platform
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Gable, a data change management platform, analyzes code-level changes to prevent data-breaking issues. Since its launch, Gable has added CI/CD integrations, contract versioning, automated rollback safety checks, and dynamic data diffing for downstream impact analysis. Gable is expanding deeper into CI/CD workflows, enabling progressive delivery for data changes.

articles.title: AI is choosing what consumers buy. Is your brand in the cart?
articles.author: Consumer shopping
articles.summary: AI agents are transforming commerce by detecting consumer needs and completing purchases automatically. For instance, an AI agent can identify a low supply of Lancome's L'Absolu Rouge Drama lipstick and order it on behalf of the consumer. This shift requires brands to adapt their strategies to be discoverable and build trust with these AI agents.

articles.title: This 'powerful' electric spin scrubber is normally $400, but it's 88% off right now on Amazon Canada
articles.author: Sarah Rohoman
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the "Electric Spin Scrubber" at 88% off. The scrubber features nine detachable brushes, two speeds, and an extendable handle. Customer reviews highlight its ease of use and effectiveness, with some considering it a "cleaning game-changer".

articles.title: ROG Xbox Ally X review - Microsoft switch to a handhel
articles.author: Game Central
articles.summary: Asus and Microsoft collaborated on the ROG Xbox Ally X, a portable gaming device inspired by the Nintendo Switch but operating as a portable PC. The ROG Xbox Ally X offers impressive high-end performance with the latest state-of-the-art games.

articles.title: HeySanta is a terrifying, twerking AI robot
articles.author: Gail Sherman
articles.summary: KhanFlicks has launched HeySanta, an AI-powered Santa robot capable of twerking, telling jokes, singing carols, and holding conversations using generative AI. The robot, programmable via block coding and featuring LCD panel eyes, met its funding goal and will ship in November with pledges starting at $69.

articles.title: Roku Launches Live Sports Scores, AI-Powered Voice Search
articles.author: Lucas Manfredi
articles.summary: The company is introducing new mobile app features. These include closed captions, Find My Remote, a sleep timer, and daily trivia.

articles.title: Button Launches "CuratedBy' to Help Publishers Scale Commerce for the AI-Driven Discovery Era
articles.summary: Button, a mobile technology company, has launched CuratedBy Button, a publisher-first solution. This new product is designed to enable publishers to efficiently create and distribute shoppable content across social platforms and on-site environments. CuratedBy Button aims to provide a dynamic content curation engine for publishers.

articles.title: StackAdapt Launches General Availability of Martech Suite, Unifying Email, Programmatic, and First-Party Data in One AI-Powered Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: StackAdapt has launched its martech suite, an integrated marketing solution that brings together email marketing, first-party data activation, and programmatic advertising into an AI-powered platform.  The suite features integrations with platforms like HubSpot and Braze, enabling marketers to automate cross-channel campaigns and personalize customer journeys with dynamic creative optimization across various verticals.

articles.title: Honor reveals a new smartphone with a fold-out robotic camera arm
articles.author: Evelyn Cheng
articles.summary: Honor is developing a 'robot phone' with a robotic arm for the camera and plans to share details at Mobile World Congress. The company is also rolling out AI tools for its smartphones, including personalized shopping and improved camera assistance. This initiative is part of Honor's $10 billion investment to transform into an AI device company.

articles.title: WATCH: Altron launches SA's first AI factory
articles.summary: Altron has launched South Africa's first operational AI factory, named 'AI marketplace'. This new service, powered by Nvidia, provides local businesses with high-performance computing and expert support to accelerate AI adoption.

articles.title: Button Launches 'CuratedBy' to Help Publishers Scale Commerce for the AI-Driven Discovery Era
articles.author: Button
articles.summary: Button launched CuratedBy Button, a solution for publishers to scale commerce-driven content. CuratedBy Button enables shoppable collections and product spotlights on social platforms and on-site environments. This allows publishers to provide content that helps deliver dynamic, shoppable content that provides a new canvas for retail media in environments they control.

articles.title: Continuing Coverage of Giant Skeletons Circa 2025
articles.author: Prince
articles.summary: Trader Joe's is opening a new store. On Cloud, a running shoe company, is opening a brick and mortar store in DC. Dig Inn opened a new Washington, D.C. location on October 22.

articles.title: Asus ROG Xbox Ally review: Comfort of a handheld with full Xbox experience
articles.summary: Asus has launched the ROG Xbox Ally, a gaming handheld device targeted at casual gamers. The device offers an Xbox interface and claims to address performance issues of previous Windows handhelds, providing a console-level gaming experience with added portability. Buyers will receive three months of Xbox Game Pass Premium for free with the device.

articles.title: Target just slashed $60 off this bestselling Dyson vacuum that pet owners are obsessed with
articles.author: Rachel Morrison
articles.summary: Target is offering the Dyson V8 Origin cordless vacuum for $379.99, a discount from its regular price of $439.99. The V8 Origin features a digital motor with up to 110,000 RPM, up to 40 minutes of runtime, and a lightweight design suitable for various cleaning tasks.

articles.title: Stuck on Windows 10? Tiny11 25H2 is here to answer the prayers of those who can't upgrade to Windows 11
articles.author: Darren Allan
articles.summary: Tiny11 has released its 25H2 version, a lightweight and debloated take on Windows 11, coinciding with the end of Windows 10 support. Tiny11 25H2 allows users to experience the latest Windows features on older PCs, bypassing system requirements and Microsoft account restrictions. The update offers a streamlined installation and the option to build a custom ISO using Tiny11 Builder.

articles.title: Xbox Ally and Ally X review: this is not an Xbox
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: Microsoft and Asus have launched the Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X handheld gaming devices. The Xbox Ally X, priced at $999, features an AMD Ryzen Z2 Extreme chip, 24GB of memory, and an 80Wh battery. The white Xbox Ally is priced at $599, but reviewers found several bugs.

articles.title: M&S shoppers can get a set of three perfumes for 60p
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: M&S offers a Fragrance Trio Set Eau de Toilette for a discounted price of 60p for new TopCashback customers. The set includes White Coconut, Sweet Pistachio, and Pink Pepper fragrances. Space NK also offers Cheirosa '62 Perfume Mist and Vanilla Skin Body Mist at reduced prices.

articles.title: Apple Teases Brand New Product And It's Not MacBook Pro — Just Hours Away
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Apple has unveiled a new product. Details about its features are anticipated.

articles.title: 5 latest launch TVs you should not miss for vivid picture and sound quality: Top picks of the best smart TVs this season
articles.author: Iqbal
articles.summary: LG launched the UA82 Series 4K Ultra HD Smart webOS LED TV featuring the α7 AI Processor 4K Gen8. Samsung introduced the Crystal 4K Vista Ultra HD Smart LED TV with a Crystal Processor 4K. Sony released the BRAVIA 5 4K Ultra HD Smart Mini LED Google TV with XR Processor. Hisense launched the U7Q Series 4K Ultra HD Smart QLED Mini LED TV with Hi-View AI Engine, and TCL released the Q6C Series 4K UHD Smart QD-Mini LED Google TV powered by QD-Mini LED technology.

articles.title: Viamedia Goes All-In on AI, Rebrands to Challenge Advertising Status Quo
articles.summary: Viamedia launched Viamedia.ai, an AI-powered platform that unifies advertising across linear TV, connected TV, and digital channels. The platform integrates LocalFactor's technology with Viamedia's inventory, providing advertisers with streamlined solutions. Through 2026, Viamedia.ai will continue to roll out new tools and features that expand its omni-channel capabilities and deepen its AI-driven insights.

articles.title: Foodservice Management Research by Agilysys Reveals Critical 'Aspiration-Readiness Gap' in Accomodating Dining Preferences
articles.summary: Agilysys released their 2025 Foodservice Management Industry Impact Study, which highlights the advantages of expanding traditional operational priorities to include Preference-Driven Dining Excellence. Agilysys aims to equip foodservice providers to address customer preferences while also improving day-to-day operations and increasing revenue with their state-of-the-art hospitality software solutions and services.

articles.title: Salsify AI Transforms PXM Ops for Digital Shelf & Agentic Commerce
articles.summary: Salsify has launched new AI-powered capabilities, 'Angie' and 'Intelligence Suite', designed to automate and streamline operational workflows within its Product Experience Management (PXM) platform. 'Angie' is an AI assistant that helps users with complex tasks through a conversational interface, while 'Intelligence Suite' offers pre-packaged AI accelerators for content creation, data extraction, and governance. Additionally, Salsify introduced a new OpenAI channel to enable customers to publish product data directly to OpenAI for agentic shopping experiences.

articles.title: Salsify AI Transforms PXM Ops for Digital Shelf & Agentic Commerce
articles.author: Salsify
articles.summary: Salsify launched new AI-powered automation capabilities for its Product Experience Management (PXM) platform, designed to integrate into customers' existing operational workflows. These capabilities aim to accelerate return on AI investment by seamlessly integrating AI, automated, and human-powered actions into unified business processes, scaling optimized product experiences across channels and audiences.

articles.title: 7 Best New Target Gift Finds Hitting Shelves This Week — Best Life
articles.author: Leah Barrett
articles.summary: Target is offering several new products as gift options. These include the Sol de Janeiro Delicia Drench Jet Set, the interactive Bitzee Hamster Ball, the Wicked x Stanley Glinda for Good tumbler, the BYOMA Hydrating Starter Skincare Kit, Keurig K-Mini Mate Single-Serve Coffee Maker, and the LEGO Sunflowers Building Toy Set.

articles.title: 36 Tiktok Fan Faves
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Several new products are introduced, including SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes, Gold Bond firming neck and chest cream, Medicube Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer, Lattafa Yara perfume, Lottabody's Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse, Lumify Eye Drops, EOS' new Crème de Pistachio Shea Better Body Lotion, and L'Oreal Paris Infallible setting spray. These products cover categories like skincare, fragrance, and hair care, each with unique features and benefits highlighted.

articles.title: Amazon Has A List Of Internet-Famous Products And These 33 Are Truly Spectacular
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: A user purchased a new exfoliating product after seeing a TikTok ad. The product effectively removes dead skin from various body parts, including the face, legs, and lips, without requiring harsh scrubbing. It also smoothed a callous, demonstrating its effectiveness in skin exfoliation.

articles.title: 51 Pretty Innovative Home Products You'll Probably Want Now That You've Learned They Exist
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article introduces various new products and services for home improvement and convenience. The products include a foaming drain cleaner, a Pikk-It tool for removing tangled hair, a hoodie hanger, a water bottle organizer, picture hooks, and a WD-40 pen. Other products include a Doap bar for removing dough, a KitchenAid cookie slider sheet, a convertible potty-training toilet seat, a lidded charcuterie board, and a refillable candle kit.

articles.title: AIKONIC AI Integrates Smart Hardware with Proactive AI to Enable an Anticipatory Intelligence Experience
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: AIKONIC has launched its AIKONIC AI NOTE, a smart recording tool that integrates hardware with Proactive AI. The AIKONIC AI NOTE is available for public sale on their official website for US$129 per unit and offers various subscription plans like Starter Plan, Note Plus, Pro Plan, and Unlimited Plan.

articles.title: Next's beauty advent calendars look ‘better than ever' for 2025, here's what's inside
articles.author: Lucy Smith
articles.summary: Next has launched two beauty advent calendars for the Christmas season: the 25 days of beauty calendar priced at £95 and a luxury beauty calendar at £185. These calendars contain products from brands like Hello Sunday, Bondi Sands, Noble Isle, and Neom, and are positioned as affordable alternatives to those offered by high-end department stores.

articles.title: 【Beauty Within】千百種護膚品中 Fel的最愛
articles.summary: The BW store has launched new products including steam hair masks, rich repair creams, and popular acne creams. These products are personally tested and considered effective by the BW store, which functions as a platform for sharing trusted and favorite products.

articles.title: Rania de Jordanie ne déroge pas au code vestimentaire du Vatican pour rencontrer le Pape
articles.author: Giorgia Olivieri
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes by creating profiles of wealthy young parents to target advertising within partner apps. The company partners with an agency that has a network of clients with high-income customers to identify potential buyers.

articles.title: 31 Things To Make Your Life Seem Put-Together On The *Surface*
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article highlights several new or noteworthy products. I Dew Care introduced a dry shampoo powder with a powder-puff applicator for easy application and volume. John Frieda launched Secret Weapon Touch Up Creme designed for use on dry hair to make it waaaaaaayyyy more manageable in between washes. iRobot introduced Roomba that vacuums and mops at the same time.

articles.title: [브레이크뉴스] 넷마블 엠엔비, ‘쿵야 레스토랑즈' 부산서 팝업스토어 용두산 분식 진행
articles.author: 정민우 기자
articles.summary: Netmarble's subsidiary, MNB, is launching a pop-up store called 'Yongdusan Snack' for its 'Kungya Restaurants' brand in Busan.  The pop-up features new merchandise, including T-shirts, gym bags, illustrated postcards, and printed doll keychains, along with interactive activities and retro snack shop concept.

articles.title: New Insurance App 2025: One-Tap Cover Fixes Forgotten Policies
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: forgettable, a newly launched AI-powered app, consolidates and simplifies insurance policies into a user-friendly dashboard. The app is available on iOS and Android and aims to help users understand their coverage and make informed decisions about their insurance needs.

articles.title: Yas Living Fully Subscribed, Aldar Records Over AED 1.3 Billion in Sales
articles.author: The Arabian Post
articles.summary: Aldar launched its Yas Living development, comprising 678 apartments across three buildings. The development, offering studios to three-bedroom units with dedicated amenities, secured over AED 1.3 billion in sales within days of its launch.

articles.title: Exploring Northwest Network's Role as Content Writers: A Focus on Delivering Quality Article Content
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Northwest Network specializes in providing SEO-optimized articles and a diverse range of content writing solutions, including blog posts, website content, articles, product descriptions, case studies, white papers and eBooks. Their content creation process includes in-depth keyword research, audience persona growth, and expert writing and editing, aiming to drive organic traffic and improve customer engagement.

articles.title: Ariel advert banned for ‘unverifiable' comparisons with competitor brands
articles.author: James Beeson
articles.summary: Ariel, owned by Procter & Gamble, advertised 'The Big One' laundry pods, highlighting its 'built-in pre-treat' for stain and odour removal, claiming it's as effective as using other products in combination with laundry additives. The ASA ruled the claims were unsubstantiated as they compared the product's stain and odour removal power to competitors without verifiable evidence.

articles.title: "It was nice to be able to eat and try the food and cosmetics that I was thinking about buying or no..
articles.author: A Whimsical Lake
articles.summary: SSG.COM held an offline event called 'Middle' to showcase products from various brands available on their e-commerce platform. The event featured food, cosmetics, and other products from brands like CJ Cheil Jedang, Nongshim, Pulmuone, Shinsegae Food, Lancôme, Estée Lauder, and SK-II, allowing consumers to experience them offline. Admission fee is 30,000 won and up to 20% discount coupons will be provided for brand products participating in unknown booths.

articles.title: Google Search now lets you hide ads: Here's how
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new feature called 'Hide sponsored results' for its Search and Discover pages. This feature enables users to collapse ads on Google Search results, offering a more streamlined browsing experience. Additionally, a 'What's New' button will appear for sports-related searches, and the Discover feed will include AI-powered previews.

articles.title: From Edinburgh to the world – commercial and industrial cleaning firm expands with new wholesale brand KLINYA
articles.author: The Newsroom
articles.summary: Flexiclean Group LTD, an Edinburgh-based company, has launched a new brand called KLINYA, offering affordable cleaning products designed for industrial and commercial cleaning companies across the UK. KLINYA aims to provide essential supplies and advanced cleaning materials through its e-commerce website, marking an expansion into wholesale services.

articles.title: Best Lightweight Moisturisers – Top Picks from Myntra Diwali Sale
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Myntra is promoting various moisturizers during its Diwali Sale, including Ponds Super Light Gel Moisturiser, Joy Hydra Refresh Ultra-Light Gel Moisturiser, Foxtale Vitamin C Glow Moisturiser, and Nivea Soft Moisturising Cream. These products offer hydration and nourishment for different skin types, with features like hyaluronic acid, Vitamin C, and Vitamin E.

articles.title: Make Your Own ChatGPT Clone For Just $100 Via Newly Released Nanochat But There's A Catch
articles.author: Lance Eliot
articles.summary: Andrej Karpathy released 'nanochat' on October 13, 2025, an AI-building capability enabling users to create ChatGPT-like clones. Nanochat provides specialized AI-building tools for a do-it-yourself approach to creating generative AI or large language models (LLM), costing around $100 for server GPU processing time to create a minimalist version.

articles.title: 'X' Launches New Draft Sync Feature, Continue Drafts Started on Mobile on Web, Know Latest Update  Patrika English News
articles.summary: X (formerly Twitter) has launched a new feature called "Draft Sync" that enables users to access and edit drafts created on their mobile devices on the web browser. Currently, the feature is available on iOS and web versions, with Android support expected by the end of 2025. The initial version supports only text drafts, with media sync support planned for the future.

articles.title: Press Advantage Launches Enhanced White-Label Reporting for Agencies Managing High-Volume Clients
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: Press Advantage has launched an enhanced white-label reporting system for digital agencies. The new system automates report generation, integrates with tools like Google Sheets, and provides branded reports showcasing backlinks and ranking improvements. This aims to reduce manual report generation time and improve client satisfaction.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil its long-awaited Project Moohan XR headset on October 21: Details here
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its Galaxy XR headset on October 21 at the World Wide Open event. The Galaxy XR is the first commercial product to use the Android XR platform for augmented reality. The event will reveal details on the headset's features, price, and release timeline.

articles.title: Huawei's Triple Leap Forward in AI UBB at UBBF 2025
articles.summary: Huawei announced its 'Triple Leap to UBB AI' strategy, aimed at transforming the telecommunications industry with AI-powered ultra-broadband. This includes a shift towards experience-centric monetization, expanding business opportunities into digital and smart services via residential gateways and FTTO solutions, and transforming network operations through automation, exemplified by the collaboration with MasOrange in Spain to create Europe's first Layer 4 standalone IP network.

articles.title: NedGraphics Launches 2026 Software Update, Setting a New Standard for Textile Design
articles.summary: NedGraphics has launched NedGraphics 2026, a software update introducing AI, 3D simulation, and intelligent file management for textile design and production. The update includes AI-driven Colorway Assistants for Adobe Photoshop, U3M-powered 3D viewers in Tuft Premium and Jacquard Premium, and NEDTag for automated metadata tagging.

articles.title: Samsung Project Moohan XR Headset Launch Date Announced at Upcoming Galaxy Event on October 21; Check Details
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its new mixed reality headset, Project Moohan, on October 21, 2025, during the Galaxy Event. The headset is built on Google's Android XR platform and is designed to offer new ways to play, discover, and work. The event will be live-streamed on Samsung Newsroom and the company's official YouTube channel.

articles.title: Virgin Media offers some broadband customers new mobile upgrades - are you eligible?
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Virgin Media O2 is offering new mobile plan options within its Volt broadband bundle. Customers can now choose from three tiers: Classic, Plus, and Ultimate. The Plus plan offers data rollover and a six-month Extra, while the Ultimate plan provides extended roaming and a lifetime Extra.

articles.title: BFJ Digital Reports How HubSpot's Customer Data Capabilities Boost Advertising Performance
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: BFJ Digital is helping businesses transform HubSpot into a central data hub to improve advertising performance across platforms like Google Ads and Meta.  By integrating CRM, ad accounts, and analytics within HubSpot, businesses can achieve smarter targeting, clearer attribution, and personalized customer experiences.

articles.title: Samsung will launch first-ever Android XR headset on October 21
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil its new Project Moohan mixed reality headset at the "Worldwide Open" event on October 21. Powered by Android XR and featuring integrated AI software, the device aims to seamlessly combine everyday utility with immersive new experiences and set a new benchmark for XR. Samsung is also offering a $100 credit to those who reserve the headset.

articles.title: 45 Semi-Ridiculous Things To Buy If You Feel Wacky
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Various new products are being introduced.  Vlasic's Pickle Balls are now available as a flavored puff snack. Liquid Death has launched Cereal Criminal Sparkling Water, a fruity pebbles flavored drink.  Built is offering "Puff Protein Bars," chocolate-covered marshmallows with 17g of protein.

articles.title: Future of TV Briefing: The ad product OpenAI should introduce in Sora (I'm sorry)
articles.summary: OpenAI is considering launching a commercial version of Sora's Cameos feature. This new product could potentially integrate sponsored products, affiliate commerce, and revenue-sharing programs for creators. It represents a new ad product for OpenAI, potentially featuring AI-generated videos.

articles.title: Locally-made hygienic washing powder penetrates market
articles.author: Pauline Dikuelo
articles.summary: Her company launched a new perfumed, hygienic washing powder in February after a year-and-a-half-long research and development process. The washing powder, suitable for both hand and machine washing, is designed to restore whiteness, brighten dark fabrics, and remove soil quickly, targeting households, hotels like Cresta Hotel, small tuck shops, and health facilities.

articles.title: 33 Handy Items You'll Wish You'd Bought Sooner
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Medicube has launched dual-textured toner pads soaked in lactic and salicylic acid, designed to exfoliate skin and reduce pore visibility. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder, a product that mattifies skin and maintains its natural glow with blue hyaluronic acid. FryAway released Waste Cooking Oil Solidifier Powder, which simplifies the disposal of leftover cooking grease by solidifying it.

articles.title: LG Unveils 'ESSENTIAL SERIES': A New Line of Home Appliances 'Made For India' (LG Corp)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: LG Electronics India Ltd. (LGEIL) launched the LG Essential Series, a new line of home appliances designed with Indian insights. This launch represents LGEIL's first major consumer initiative following "Har Ghar Appliances, Har Ghar Happiness."

articles.title: Unveiling the Power of OpenAI's GPT-3.5-turbo: A Gateway to Advanced AI Capabilities for Developers
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: OpenAI launched GPT-3.5-turbo, a refined version of the GPT-3 series, optimized for conversational applications and developer integration. It offers faster response times, reduced costs, and enhanced instruction following. Developers can leverage it for chatbots, content creation, code generation, data analysis, language translation, and personalized recommendations.

articles.title: Black Couple, 20 Years in the Industry, Celebrates Their Food Products Being Sold in Walmart and 2,500 Stores
articles.author: Ndg Staff
articles.summary: Nicobi Foods' products are now available in Walmart stores across the East Coast, with further rollouts planned through 2025. The company is expanding its line of flavors, introducing new sauces and blends. They aim to place Nicobi products in more than 2,500 stores by the end of the year.

articles.title: Black Couple, 20 Years in the Industry, Celebrates Their Food Products Being Sold in Walmart and 2,500 Stores
articles.author: Ndg Staff
articles.summary: Nicobi Foods' products are now available in Walmart stores across the East Coast, with further rollouts planned through 2025. They are also expanding their product line with new sauces and blends. The company aims to place Nicobi products in more than 2,500 stores through partnerships by year's end.

articles.title: DraftKings Promo Code: Claim New $300 Bonus for MLB Playoffs, NHL Games
articles.author: Wtop
articles.summary: DraftKings has upgraded its new DraftKings promo code offer for new users. This update represents a change or addition to their service offerings.

articles.title: ALDI Gourmet: Unique Dinners with New Special Range!
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Aldi is aggressively expanding its 'Special' range, offering gourmet and premium food products at competitive prices. This range, featuring over 150 products, aims to provide 'affordable luxury' and is boosted by promotional tie-ins. The strategy signifies a shift in consumer expectations and the success is evident in increased sales, impacting the wider grocery industry.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics to unveil AI-powered Galaxy XR headset next week
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil a new product.

articles.title: Motorola launches new Moto G100 in China with massive 7,000mAh battery and Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset
articles.author: Anil Satapathy
articles.summary: Motorola has unveiled an upgraded Moto G100 in China, featuring a 7,000mAh battery with 30W fast charging, a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, and up to 12GB RAM. The device includes a 6.72-inch 120Hz display and a 50MP main camera, running on Android 15 and priced at CNY 1,399.

articles.title: Samsung Confirms October 21 Event: Teaser of New Android XR Headset Model Revealed
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is anticipated to unveil a new Android XR headset at an event on October 21st. The headset is expected to have a refined design, high-resolution micro-OLED display, hand tracking capabilities, and a strong emphasis on mixed reality, and will run on Android XR. It will also target applications like gaming, productivity, entertainment, and education.

articles.title: Škoda Launches the All-New Superb in the Middle East, Redefining Elegance and Innovation
articles.author: bizbahrain
articles.summary: Škoda Middle East has launched the all-new Škoda Superb in the Middle East. The Superb combines design with technology and comfort, embodying Škoda's commitment to automotive solutions and value.

articles.title: 27 "Most Wished For" Products From Amazon You'll Soon Be Wishing For, Too
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: Amazon features various new products including Summer Fridays tinted lip balm, Nivea gel cream with Q10, and Disney princess-themed Owala bottles. Other products are Medicube collagen overnight peel-off facial mask, pumpkin spice Dawn Powerwash spray, Verb Ghost Oil and Ninja Swirl by Creami.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics to unveil AI-powered Galaxy XR headset next week
articles.author: Kim Boram
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil the Galaxy XR, a new AI-enhanced headset powered by the Android XR platform, next week. Co-developed by Samsung, Google, and Qualcomm, Android XR is an extended reality operating system, and the Galaxy XR, code-named Project Moohan, will be the first device to utilize it. The global debut is scheduled for next Wednesday on Samsung's website.

articles.title: 2026 MG HS Hybrid+ price and specs
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: MG offers a $1000 fuel voucher to customers purchasing a new MG HS Hybrid+ between October 11 and November 2, 2025. Customers test driving the vehicle on weekends between October 11 and December 21 will receive a gift valued at $50.

articles.title: AI Online Services Introduces AI-Powered Digital Solutions Promising 10X Faster Results
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: October 14, 2025 - introduced next-generation AI-powered digital services. These services include AI Digital Marketing, AI SEO, AI-Powered Web Development, and AI Social Media Marketing. The services are designed to deliver '10X Faster Results.

articles.title: A new app just launched and it fixes the one thing you've been ignoring: insurance
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: forgettable has launched a new AI-powered app designed to simplify insurance management. The app brings all insurance policies into one dashboard, explains them in everyday language, and answers practical questions. Available on iOS and Android, the app also helps users identify coverage gaps and purchase protection options directly.

articles.title: Sainsbury's Tu 'in demand' �24 sparkly jumper available for �8 today away from the supermarket
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Sainsbury's has a 'sparkly jumper' that is already labelled as 'in demand', indicating a potentially new and popular product offering.

articles.title: Next's 'timeless' barn jacket rivalling sold out Marks and Spencer version is still in stock
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Next offers its version of a barn jacket, presenting an alternative to Marks and Spencer's popular item.

articles.title: Namibian innovation key driver for competitive advantage
articles.author: Namibian Sun
articles.summary: NEO Paints, Namibia's oldest paint manufacturer, introduced its new NEO Xpert Range. This introduction reaffirms the company's commitment to the local industry.

articles.title: NeoVolta Closes Neubau Energy Asset Purchase to Launch neuClick™ Modular Battery Platform
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: The company aims to secure 1,000 pre-orders for its neuClick™ battery module by Q4 2025. Shipping of the neuClick™ battery module is scheduled to commence in January 2026.

articles.title: Inspired by Snuggle® Brand's Best-Selling Scents, New Homesick Candles Bring Laundry to Homes in a ...
articles.author: My Horry News
articles.summary: Snuggle® brand and Homesick have launched two limited-edition candles, 'Cuddle-Up Fresh™' and 'Freshly Washed™'. These candles aim to transform any room into a haven of comfort.

articles.title: Where to buy Nintendo Switch 2 Pokémon Legends Z-A bundles – stock checks and updates ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo is planning to launch a Nintendo Switch 2 Pokémon Legends: Z-A bundle. This reveals a potential new product offering from Nintendo.

articles.title: Anthropic Launches Smaller, Faster Claude Haiku 4.5 AI Model
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: The developer launched Haiku, a new product that outperforms their Sonnet 4 model at a third of the cost.

articles.title: MegazoneCloud's AIR Studio Earns Korea's First ISO/IEC 42001 Certification for AI Management Systems
articles.author: Finger Lakes Times
articles.summary: MegazoneCloud is leading AI-native digital transformation.

articles.title: Anthropic's Claude Haiku 4.5 matches May's frontier model at fraction of cost
articles.author: Ars Technica
articles.summary: Anthropic has released Claude Haiku 4.5, a new AI language model. This model provides performance comparable to the previous Claude Sonnet 4 but at a reduced cost and increased speed. Claude Haiku 4.5 is now accessible to all users of the Claude app, web, and API.

articles.title: Schenectady 2025, Neil Golub: It's time we celebrate New Schenectady
articles.author: Stanley Hudy
articles.summary: Schenectady leaders considered a proposal to rebrand the city as "New Schenectady" to highlight its successes. The marketing plan aimed to promote Schenectady in the Capital Region at no cost to the city. The initiative draws inspiration from Procter & Gamble's approach to advertising the improved "New Tide" detergent.
